title: Which laptop is best, HP 15 10th generation or HP 15s 10 generation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both are really similar laptops but it is not possible to judge without knowing that model number you have shortlisted for the HP 15 or the HP 15S. In general, here is the difference between the two: HP 15 vs HP 15s - Compare Laptops You will not find anything solid with the comparison unless you have the actual model numbers handy.
